Detailed Description

Controls the Robots. Responsible for assigning the View to each Robot and calling the compute method when requested.

RobotControl holds a buffer of Views of length history_length. To do this, the RobotControl implements the SimulationListener interface. Whenever update is called together with an HandleRequestsEvent RobotControl creates a new View for the new WorldInfortion.
